directions: Rub lime wedges around rims of 4 Margarita glasses.
Dip rims in salt to coat lightly.
In a medium pitcher, combine beer, limeade, and tequila.
Fill prepared glasses with ice, then with margarita mixture.
ingredients: 2 chilled 12-oz bottles beer (not dark; preferably a lighter-style lager)
title: Beer Margaritas
